name: A Well-Worn Trail Through the Forest
description:
You're on a well-worn trail through the dense forest. A mostly overgrown, disused path heads into the forest to the north. The well-worn trail heads east and west.
You can see smoke in the sky through the trees to the west.

features.look: It's a dirt path leading north, mostly overtaken by encroaching weeds. It hasn't seen traffic in a long time.
It's a well-worn dirt trail. It must see frequent traffic since there's hardly any weeds or grass growing.
It's not thick and black like the forest is on fire. It looks like campfire smoke or something similar.
